Now, let's create the BoxReveal component:

---

```diff
- 
+ import {cn} from '@/lib/utils'
+ import {motion} from 'framer-motion'
+ import type React from 'react'
+ 
+ interface BoxRevealProps {
+   children: React.ReactNode
+   className?: string
+   boxColor?: string
+   duration?: number
+ }
+ 
+ export const BoxReveal = ({
+   children,
+   className,
+   boxColor = '#ff6b35',
+   duration = 0.5,
+ }: BoxRevealProps) => {
+   return (
+     <div className={cn('box-reveal relative z-0 w-fit', className)}>
+       <span>{children}</span>
+       <motion.span
+         className='absolute inset-0 z-50 block h-full w-full'
+         style={{backgroundColor: boxColor}}
+         initial={{scaleX: 0, originX: 0}}
+         whileInView={{scaleX: 1, originX: 0}}
+         transition={{
+           duration: duration,
+           ease: 'easeInOut',
+         }}
+         viewport={{once: true}}
+       />
+       <motion.span
+         className='absolute inset-0 z-50 block h-full w-full'
+         style={{backgroundColor: boxColor}}
+         initial={{scaleX: 1, originX: 0}}
+         whileInView={{scaleX: 0, originX: 1}}
+         transition={{
+           duration: duration,
+           ease: 'easeInOut',
+           delay: duration,
+         }}
+         viewport={{once: true}}
+       />
+     </div>
+   )
+ }
+ 
```
